message.body: I left you a message a few minutes ago. I talked to Beth. She recommend among other things to bring in the Dogs!
I had kind of forgotten about that but apparently some dogs can sniff out bedbugs with incredible accuracy.
Haha
Oh my
Haha that sounds great haha
ï¿¼
(My bed is in center of floor on metal stilts, mattress covered in the vinyl you bought, and I sit on mattress and try to just stay on that island while home lol
I'm clearly just extra sensitive to them bc each bite is pretty big, which is why I thought they were spider bites :( bc they're raised red welts boohoo
So yesss bring on the dogs. I'm currently drying all my stuff Again and putting more in trash bags

I just talked to the Guy with the dogs for like 20 minutes. And towards the end of the conversation he mentions that if we already treated then he can't use the dogs because it damages their nasal cavities....... Agggghhh!!!
Did you get a chance to call Beth?
Nooooooo
Hahahaha nooooo that sucks
Send me Beth's number again?
What time is Cindy coming tomorrow?
I just Scrolled back thru your texts. It looks like she will be there at 10. I'm going to ask everyone to leave their bedroom doors unlocked.
Thnx
Yeah ten
Can you ask Cindy to check all of the other rooms. I sent everyone a text yesterday asking them to leave their doors open if they aren't going to be home.
Sure
Did you get a chance to call Beth?
She didn't come over
Or maybe she did at 11 when I left to work
David said something about her coming at 2. Can you call her to find out? Sorry.
Oh we decided on 10
Sure.
Yeah. I'm confused. She didn't call or anything?
No
Geez.
I woke up a 4 AM to text you guys too. Arrrrrgggghhh! A little communication goes a long way.
I just dropped off Jo at work. I'll call her when I get home.
I just spoke with Beth for a while. I also called Cindy but her voicemail is full.
Beth said we should rip up the carpet. I REALLY REALLY WISH she has told me to do that a couple weeks ago.
Haha yeah
You just can't make this shit up....... Aggggghhhh!!!
If you spoken to Beth in the last couple days?
I mean from the website it is clear that the carpet needs to go and also my furniture
She was saying its not so much the carpet but more if there are gaps in the flooring.
Which we can't see when there is carpet. Either way the carpet has to go.
I haven't spoken to her no
What's under the carpet haha
I can't remember but it's probably hardwood with a couple patches. But apparently that's how they travel. Is there anyway you could call her?
I would love it removed
I think carpets are gross
